survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees about their experience at the recent industry conference, focusing on session quality, networking opportunities, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall conference experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for easy selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall conference experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following session types did you attend? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse attendee engagement. Consider adding an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following session types did you attend? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most valuable aspect of the conference for you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What was the most valuable aspect of the conference for you?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the speakers at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency. Ensure question is visually distinct from Q1 to avoid confusion.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the speakers at the conference?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this conference to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question with a neutral option. Helps measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: Would you recommend this conference to a colleague?
